verses.verse: And I lifted up <S%H5375><s%> mine eyes <S%H5869><s%>, and saw <S%H7200><s%>, and <S%H376><s%>, behold, a man with a measuring <S%H4060><s%> line <S%H2256><s%> in his hand <S%H3027><s%>.

Then said <S%H559><s%> I <S%H1980><s%>, Whither goest thou <S%H559><s%>? And he said unto me <S%H4058><s%>, To measure Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%>, to see <S%H7200><s%> what <S%H4100><s%> is the breadth <S%H7341><s%> thereof <S%H753><s%>, and what is the length thereof.
And <S%H4397><s%>, behold, the angel that talked <S%H1696><s%> with me went forth <S%H3318><s%>, and another <S%H312><s%> angel <S%H4397><s%> went out <S%H3318><s%> to meet him <S%H7125><s%>,

and said <S%H559><s%> unto him <S%H7323><s%>, Run, speak <S%H1696><s%> to this <S%H1975><s%> young man <S%H5288><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>, Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%> shall be inhabited <S%H3427><s%> as villages without walls <S%H6519><s%>, by reason of the multitude <S%H7230><s%> of men <S%H120><s%> and cattle <S%H929><s%> therein <S%H8432><s%>.

For I <S%H5002><s%>, saith Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, will be unto her a wall <S%H2346><s%> of fire <S%H784><s%> round about <S%H5439><s%>, and I will be the glory <S%H3519><s%> in the midst of her <S%H8432><s%>.

Ho <S%H1945><s%>, ho <S%H1945><s%>, flee <S%H5127><s%> from the land <S%H776><s%> of the north <S%H6828><s%>, saith <S%H5002><s%> Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>; for I have spread you abroad <S%H6566><s%> as the four <S%H702><s%> winds <S%H7307><s%> of the heavens <S%H8064><s%>, saith <S%H5002><s%> Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>.
Ho <S%H1945><s%> Zion <S%H6726><s%>, escape <S%H4422><s%>, thou that dwellest <S%H3427><s%> with the daughter <S%H1323><s%> of Babylon <S%H894><s%>.

For thus saith <S%H559><s%> Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> of hosts <S%H6635><s%>: After <S%H310><s%> glory <S%H3519><s%> hath he sent <S%H7971><s%> me unto the nations <S%H1471><s%> which plundered <S%H7997><s%> you <S%H5060><s%>; for he that toucheth you toucheth <S%H5060><s%> the apple <S%H892><s%> of his eye <S%H5869><s%>.

For <S%H5130><s%>, behold, I will shake my hand <S%H3027><s%> over them <S%H7998><s%>, and they shall be a spoil to those that served <S%H5647><s%> them <S%H3045><s%>; and ye shall know that Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> of hosts <S%H6635><s%> hath sent me <S%H7971><s%>.

Sing <S%H7442><s%> and rejoice <S%H8055><s%>, O daughter <S%H1323><s%> of Zion <S%H6726><s%>; for <S%H935><s%>, lo, I come, and I will dwell <S%H7931><s%> in the midst <S%H8432><s%> of thee <S%H5002><s%>, saith Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>.

And many <S%H7227><s%> nations <S%H1471><s%> shall join <S%H3867><s%> themselves to Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> in that day <S%H3117><s%>, and shall be my people <S%H5971><s%>; and I will dwell <S%H7931><s%> in the midst <S%H8432><s%> of thee <S%H3045><s%>, and thou shalt know that Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> of hosts <S%H6635><s%> has sent me unto thee <S%H7971><s%>.

And Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> shall inherit <S%H5157><s%> Judah <S%H3063><s%> as his portion <S%H2506><s%> in the holy <S%H6944><s%> land <S%H127><s%>, and shall yet choose <S%H977><s%> Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%>.
Be silent <S%H2013><s%>, all flesh <S%H1320><s%>, before <S%H6440><s%> Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>; for he is waked up <S%H5782><s%> out of his holy <S%H6944><s%> habitation <S%H4583><s%>.
